definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

pinyin: huo3 shan1 bao4 fa1 zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: The black rocks are all lava from a volcano which erupted here 10.000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這些黑色的岩石都是一萬年前火山爆發流出的岩漿。

sentences.english: They all sat in front of the telly and watched the Icelandic volcano erupting.
sentences.chinese: 他們全都坐在電視機前，看冰島火山爆發。

sentences.english: The Minoan civilization disappeared suddenly at about the same time as the volcanic eruption.
sentences.chinese: 米諾斯文明的突然消失與這次火山爆發幾乎同時。

sentences.english: Volcanoes are awesome manifestations of the fiery power contained deep within the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 火山爆發是蘊藏地球深部炙熱能量令人生畏的宣泄。

sentences.english: Cows killed in the eruption of Mount Merapi lie in Argomulyo, Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 印尼默拉皮火山爆發，放到了阿果穆羅的奶牛。

sentences.english: Why did the recent volcanic eruption in Iceland create so much ash?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼近期冰島的火山爆發製造了這麼多火山灰？

sentences.english: In summer, circa 1470 BC, Santorini exploded.
sentences.chinese: 大約在公元前1470年夏天，聖多里尼火山爆發了。

sentences.english: It is one of five such volcanoes that make up Hawaii's Big Island.
sentences.chinese: 這是五份之一如此的火山爆發，製造夏威夷的大島。

sentences.english: Pompeii was destroyed by an eruption of volcano.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬龐貝城毀於火山爆發。
火山爆發是冰島復仇記？

sentences.english: The violent volcanic forces upheaved the land of the whole area.
sentences.chinese: 火山爆發的強大力量使整個地區的土地隆起。

sentences.english: The repercussions of the Laki Volcano eruption in Iceland resonated throughout Europe for the next few years.
sentences.chinese: 冰島拉基火山爆發所產生的間接影響還持續了好幾年。

sentences.english: The police were searching the mountain for the murderer when the volcano broke out.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在搜山尋找那個殺人犯，這時火山爆發了。

sentences.english: The eruption also seems to have coincided with the start of a 1000-year period of even colder temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 多巴火山爆發的時間也正是千年寒冷期的開端。

sentences.english: The Permian was curtailed by massive volcanism.
sentences.chinese: 二疊紀被大量火山爆發縮短了時間。

sentences.english: Lyla:That's true, I would like to see a volcano erupt.
sentences.chinese: 也是，要是我也很想看到火山爆發。

definition: to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
fantastic oddities of every description (idiom); grotesquely shaped

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4
